# sourceView

**Instance Property**

The view that the sheet centers itself over.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sourceView: UIView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which means the system centers edge-attached sheets on the edge they attach to, and centers floating sheets vertically and horizontally in the window.

To customize the sheet’s position, set a view within the view hierarchy of the presenting view controller as the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISheetPresentationController/sourceView] of the sheet. The sheet attempts to visually center itself over this view. The system only positions the sheet within system-defined margins.
